title: Very high ping and crashing in-game since new patch
body: Since patch 7.18 every once in a while my games will all have very high ping (over 5K sometimes) and the game becomes unplayable. I thought it might be my internet, but today I was playing CPU games to try and test it, and after my ping spiked the game straight up crashed and closed itself. Why is this happening?

replies.body: Eeeeee snap that's no good. Ping spikes that high can sometimes be attributed to packet loss, so let's start looking there first. Grab the network logs from a game that had those crazy spikes and let our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them. Take a screenshot of what it says and post it here so I can take a look for you!
